definition: (bird species of China) rainbow bee-eater (Merops ornatus)
the two mass scuttling operations carried out by the German navy: the scuttling of the German fleet at Scapa Flow in 1919 and Operation Regenbogen, the scuttling of U-boats in 1945
(bird species of China) rainbow lorikeet (Trichoglossus haematodus)

sentences.english: If you expect the rainbow, you must first be used to experiencing storm.
sentences.chinese: 如果你期盼彩虹，那就應習慣承受風雨。

sentences.english: You frown, you step, if the" grand rainbow."
sentences.chinese: 你一皺，你一步，若是彩虹絕罷的恢弘。

sentences.english: After lunch , the group will visit macadamia nuts farm , rainbow falls and an orchid garden.
sentences.chinese: 下午參觀夏威夷農場蘭花園和彩虹瀑布。

sentences.english: South Africa Has Beautiful Scenery, Mild Climate , "Rainbow Country"Good Name.
sentences.chinese: 南非風景娟秀，天氣溫順，有“彩虹之國”的美稱。

sentences.english: The beetle's rainbow colors, by the way, are all natural.
sentences.chinese: 順便說下，葉甲身上彩虹般的顏色都是天然的。

sentences.english: A kind of making real-color rainbow hologram with single-wavelength and single-beam are presented. First make three films of rainbow encoded.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種單波長單光束真彩色彩虹全息圖製作技術。

sentences.english: Some tropical rhododendrons on the back like wings, like the rainbow blue.
sentences.chinese: 有些熱帶杜鵑的背上翅膀上有像彩虹一樣的藍色。

sentences.english: Overhead soared Crested Serpent-Eagles and a rainbow load of butterflies in the tree tops.
sentences.chinese: 一道由蝴蝶串成的彩虹就掛在樹梢。

sentences.english: There was a rainbow of light and then they were through the hyper-space barrier.
sentences.chinese: 一道彩虹似的光閃過之後，他們就穿越了超空間壁壘。

sentences.english: Even when it's cloudy, keep looking for the rainbow.
sentences.chinese: 就算是天陰，別忘記期待會有彩虹。

sentences.english: The soul would have no rainbow had the eyes no tears. ----John Cheney.
sentences.chinese: 如果眼睛沒有眼淚，靈魂就不會有彩虹。

sentences.english: They take visitors to see the most beautiful rainbow.
sentences.chinese: 他們帶遊客去觀賞最美麗的彩虹。

sentences.english: My dear friends, are you rainbow clans?
sentences.chinese: 親愛的朋友們，你是“彩虹族”嗎？

sentences.english: Dones't the rainbow come after the rain?
sentences.chinese: 難道雨後不會出現彩虹？

sentences.english: There were bullet points galore. Complete with photos of fluffy white rabbits and rainbows.
sentences.chinese: 幻燈片條理清晰，並配以大白兔以及彩虹的圖片。

sentences.english: Now I step back behind the three-point line and throw up a long rainbow.
sentences.chinese: 然後我退後一步踏出三分線外，擲出一道長長的彩虹。

definition: all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
five (main) colors (white, black, red, yellow, and blue)/multicolored
Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
